page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: Robinson's Farm is a commercialised farm covering around 500acres. Bath Farm is smaller at 420 acres. The two farms are very different in the number of staff they employ and the amount of machinery the use. Bath farm has two farmers whose respective sons help part time. Robinson's Farm employs nine full time staff, four office workers and eight part time staff. Robinson's farm uses far more heavy machinery than the smaller family farm, nine tractors and three ploughs compared to six tractors and one plough. LAND USE Acres Robinson's Bath 220 Barley. 240 210 vegetables 120 000 Wheat. 060 070 grazing and 000 others
